org.apache.giraph.worker

类 InputSplitsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.worker.InputSplitsHandler
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher

    public class InputSplitsHandler
extends Object
implements org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher
    Stores the list of input split paths, and provides thread-safe way for reserving input splits.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher

                  String inputSplitReservedNode,
                  String inputSplitFinishedNode)
        Constructor
        参数:
        splitOrganizer - Input splits organizer
        zooKeeper - The worker's local ZooKeeperExt ref
        context - Context for reporting progress
        inputSplitReservedNode - ZooKeeper input split reserved node
        inputSplitFinishedNode - ZooKeeper input split finished node

    • 方法详细资料

      • reserveInputSplit

        public String reserveInputSplit()
                         throws org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException,
                                InterruptedException
        Try to reserve an InputSplit for loading. While InputSplits exists that are not finished, wait until they are. NOTE: iterations on the InputSplit list only halt for each worker when it has scanned the entire list once and found every split marked RESERVED. When a worker fails, its Ephemeral RESERVED znodes will disappear, allowing other iterating workers to claim it's previously read splits. Only when the last worker left iterating on the list fails can a danger of data loss occur. Since worker failure in INPUT_SUPERSTEP currently causes job failure, this is OK. As the failure model evolves, this behavior might need to change. We could add watches on inputSplitFinishedNodes and stop iterating only when all these nodes have been created.
        返回:
        reserved InputSplit or null if no unfinished InputSplits exist
        抛出:
        org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException
        InterruptedException

      • markInputSplitPathFinished

        public void markInputSplitPathFinished(String inputSplitPath)
        Mark an input split path as completed by this worker. This notifies the master and the other workers that this input split has not only been reserved, but also marked processed.
        参数:
        inputSplitPath - Path to the input split.

      • process

        public void process(org.apache.zookeeper.WatchedEvent event)
        指定者:
        process 在接口中 org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher
